description:
A wife eats nothing... except her husband. Three losers defeat the lord of hell.  A woman prays to survive a plague.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuwazu Nyoubou / Aa Hakushon Puu / Ushi no Koku Mairi
The Wife Who Didn`t Eat / Yawn Atchoo Poot / The Ushi no Koku Mairi
食わず女房 / ああ はくしょん プー / 丑の刻参り
